titles.title: By The Power Of Thy Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
By the power of Thy life,
Break the power of my death.
Father God, I lift my cry up unto Thee.
Bring forth this vessel still,
As Thy glory and Thy will;
Flow through my heart and mind and set me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give ear, O ye heavens, and give ear, O ye earth.
Listen ye gates of hell and all beneath.
O death I am thy plagues,
And O grave thy destruction.
O death and grave I am thy victory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So whether there be mountains,
Or valleys in between.
Whether there be perils or the sword.
I know that my Redeemer lives,
And in my flesh I'll see God.
The Light and Lamb of God, forever more.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Por el poder de Tu vida,
Rompe el poder de mi muerte.
Levanto mi clamor Oh Dios a ti.
Produce en este vaso, Tu gloria y Tu voluntad,
Inunda mi mente y libra me a mi.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oid, Oh cielos y escucha tu Oh tierra;
Oh puertas del infierno escuchad,
Oh muerte soy tu muerte,
Oh sepulcro soy tu destruccion.
Oh muerte y sepulcro tu victoria soy.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Aun si hay monta√±as O valles para cruzar,
Si hay peligro O espada a enfrentar.
Yo se que mi redentor vive;
Y en mi carne Dios vere.
La luz y el cordero de Dios conocere.
